languages.text: Проходя сквозь перегонные установки и множество фильтров, обладающее высоким энергетическим потенциалом сырье превратится в горючий прометий, а пастыри прочтут над ним молитвы, обратив в пылкую ярость Императора.

Passing through distillation plants and a multitude of filters, raw materials with high energy potential will be transformed into combustible promethium. Once the proper liturgies have been served, it will be employed as the Emperor's burning wrath.
languages.original_text: Проходя сквозь перегонные установки и множество фильтров, обладающее высоким энергетическим потенциалом сырье превратится в горючий прометий, а пастыри прочтут над ним молитвы, обратив в пылкую ярость Императора.

traits.locale_text: Passing through distillation plants and a multitude of filters, raw materials with high energy potential will be transformed into combustible promethium. Once the proper liturgies have been served, it will be employed as the Emperor's burning wrath.

Passing through distillation plants and a multitude of filters, raw materials with high energy potential will be transformed into combustible promethium. Once the proper liturgies have been served, it will be employed as the Emperor's burning wrath.

Passing through distillation plants and a multitude of filters, raw materials with high energy potential will be transformed into combustible promethium. Once the proper liturgies have been served, it will be employed as the Emperor's burning wrath.

languages.text: En traversant des usines de distillation et une multitude de filtres, les matières brutes au potentiel énergétique élevé seront transformées en prométhium combustible. Une fois les liturgies appropriées exécutées, il sera l'incarnation même de la fureur de l'Empereur.
languages.original_text: Passing through distillation plants and a multitude of filters, raw materials with high energy potential will be transformed into combustible promethium. Once the proper liturgies have been served, it will be employed as the Emperor's burning wrath.

traits.locale_text: En traversant des usines de distillation et une multitude de filtres, les matières brutes au potentiel énergétique élevé seront transformées en prométhium combustible. Une fois les liturgies appropriées exécutées, il sera l'incarnation même de la fureur de l'Empereur.

languages.text: 蒸留プラントと多数のフィルターを通過すると、高いエネルギー潜在力を持つ原料が可燃性プロメチウムに変換される。適切な典礼が行われた後、皇帝の燃えるような怒りとして使用される。
languages.original_text: Passing through distillation plants and a multitude of filters, raw materials with high energy potential will be transformed into combustible promethium. Once the proper liturgies have been served, it will be employed as the Emperor's burning wrath.

traits.locale_text: 蒸留プラントと多数のフィルターを通過すると、高いエネルギー潜在力を持つ原料が可燃性プロメチウムに変換される。適切な典礼が行われた後、皇帝の燃えるような怒りとして使用される。

languages.text: 安置蒸馏设备和多个过滤器，便可以将拥有高能潜力的原材料转化为可燃钷素。当净化仪式结束之后，这些机器就会用来散播神皇的熊熊怒火。
languages.original_text: Passing through distillation plants and a multitude of filters, raw materials with high energy potential will be transformed into combustible promethium. Once the proper liturgies have been served, it will be employed as the Emperor's burning wrath.

traits.locale_text: 安置蒸馏设备和多个过滤器，便可以将拥有高能潜力的原材料转化为可燃钷素。当净化仪式结束之后，这些机器就会用来散播神皇的熊熊怒火。

languages.text: Pasando por plantas de destilación y multitud de filtros, las materias primas con alto potencial energético se transformarán en prometio combustible. Tras celebrar las liturgias adecuadas, servirá como muestra de la cólera abrasadora del Emperador.
languages.original_text: Passing through distillation plants and a multitude of filters, raw materials with high energy potential will be transformed into combustible promethium. Once the proper liturgies have been served, it will be employed as the Emperor's burning wrath.

traits.locale_text: Pasando por plantas de destilación y multitud de filtros, las materias primas con alto potencial energético se transformarán en prometio combustible. Tras celebrar las liturgias adecuadas, servirá como muestra de la cólera abrasadora del Emperador.

languages.text: Rohstoffe mit hohem Energiepotenzial werden mit Hilfe von Destillen und einer ganzen Reihe von Filtern in brennbares Promethium verwandelt. Sobald die geeigneten Liturgien abgehalten wurden, wird es als brennender Zorn des Imperators dienen.
languages.original_text: Passing through distillation plants and a multitude of filters, raw materials with high energy potential will be transformed into combustible promethium. Once the proper liturgies have been served, it will be employed as the Emperor's burning wrath.

traits.locale_text: Rohstoffe mit hohem Energiepotenzial werden mit Hilfe von Destillen und einer ganzen Reihe von Filtern in brennbares Promethium verwandelt. Sobald die geeigneten Liturgien abgehalten wurden, wird es als brennender Zorn des Imperators dienen.

languages.text: Damıtma tesislerinden ve çok sayıda filtreden geçen enerji potansiyeli yüksek ham maddeler, yanıcı prometyuma dönüştürülecek. Bu madde, münasip ayinler gerçekleştirildikten sonra İmparator'un alev saçan gazabı olarak vazifesini yerine getirecek.
languages.original_text: Passing through distillation plants and a multitude of filters, raw materials with high energy potential will be transformed into combustible promethium. Once the proper liturgies have been served, it will be employed as the Emperor's burning wrath.
